raw_body: FERNANDO,​ IRIS DAPHNE MARY – Beloved wife of late Mervyn Brindley Fernando,​ loving mother of Avril,​ Lorraine,​ Cheryl & Rayen,​ mother-in-law of Aubrey,​ Erajh,​ Travice & Rosemary,​ grandmother of Alaine,​ Yohan & Irandi,​ Dinuk & Dhineli,​ Ayuni,​ Erajh & Charini,​ Janice,​ Michael & Cecilia,​ Nigel & Casey,​ Steve & Kayla,​ Stephan,​ Colleen,​ precious granny of 19 great grandchildren. Viewing on Friday,​ 15th March at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 9.00 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves Parlour at 3.30 p.m. for Burial at Borella General Cemetery,​ Roman Catholic Section.       018718
